name: coverage-detail-visualizer
description: SPA for vizualization of code coverage results from Bobril-build or Njsast

bobril.head: <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"/><meta http-equiv="Content-Security-Policy" content="default-src 'self';style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';img-src 'self' data:"/><script src="<<sampleData/coverage-details.js>>" charset="utf-8"></script>
